original_text: And when the dew that lay was gone up, behold, upon the face of the wilderness there lay a small round thing, as small as the hoar frost on the ground.
korean_text: 그 이슬이 마른 후에 광야 지면에 작고 둥글며 서리 같이 가는 것이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And when the dew that lay was gone up
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅에 내리던 이슬이 사라졌을 때

sentences.original_text: behold, upon the face of the wilderness
there lay a small round thing
as small as the hoar frost on the ground
